item.title: The continuing adventures of Mom cutting the cord
item.description: As a belated update to this post, Mom has told DirecTV to completely go screw and she’s moved over to Philo where she’s currently loving life.

item.title: Mom cuts the cord
item.description: OK folks, it finally happened. My mother has cut the cord and now gets all her TV needs satisfied via OTA and OTT.
